block.simpleportals.portal.name: Portal
item.simpleportals.portal_activator.tool: Use on the inner face of
commands.tpd.info: Teleports a player either to another player or to a position. Works across dimensions.
commands.tpd.success: Teleported '§b%s§r' to '§bx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§b%s§r'.
commands.sportals.clear.info: Completely clears the portal registry, without deactivating any portals. Use with §eCAUTION.
commands.sportals.list.info: Generates a list of all portals matching the supplied filter criteria. The list contains dimension, position, power and address for each portal.
commands.sportals.list.success: Successfully requested portal list. Output diverted to log.
commands.sportals.deactivate.info: Removes portals from the portal network and deactivates them.
commands.sportals.deactivate.success: Deactivated portal at '§bx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§b%s§r'.
commands.sportals.power.info: Manages the internal power of portals.
commands.sportals.power.add.success: Added '§b%d§r' power to the portal at '§bx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§b%s§r'.
commands.sportals.power.remove.success: Removed '§b%d§r' power from the portal at '§bx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§b%s§r'.
commands.sportals.power.get.success: The portal at '§bx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§b%s§r' has '§b%d§r' energy stored.
commands.sportals.power.items.success: Valid items to power portals are ('§b%d§r' total):
commands.sportals.cooldown.info: Queries the teleportation cooldown of a player. Portals can only be used once the cooldown reaches 0.
commands.sportals.cooldown.success: Cooldown for player '§b%s§r' is currently '§b%d§r' ticks (~§b%.2f§r sec).
commands.errors.missing_dimension: Dimension '§c%d§r' appears to be missing. Removing registry entries only.
commands.errors.unknown_sender: The command sender was not a player.
commands.errors.unknown_sender_dimension: No dimension was specified and the command senders dimension could not be determined.
commands.errors.portal_not_found_with_ad: No portals with the address '§c%s§r' could be found.
No portals with the address '§c%s§r' could be found in dimension '§c%s§r'.
commands.errors.portal_not_found_at_pos_: No portals could be found at '§cx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§c%s§r'.
commands.errors.multiple_portals_found_a: Multiple portals were found at '§cx=%d, y=%d, z=%d§r' in dimension '§c%s§r'. Use the coordinates of a block that is only part of one portal.
commands.errors.no_power_items: No valid items found for item tag '§c%s§r'. Check your config.
interop.top.invalid_power_source: §7No valid items found. Check your config.§r
